Text: Choir Rehearsal ScheduleAttached is an updated reherasal schedule the handchime schedule is included The worship committee approved Sunday April during the Sunday School hour for our program We are finishing up a week earlier than last year but the Sundays in May are already booked I have moved our Saturday rehearsal to the afternoon instead of the morning We lose a lot of kids to baseballl swimming dance rehearsal etc I have put the rehearsal from on April After the rehearsal I would like to feed the kids dinner and have a little choir party Because of our baseball theme I would like to have hot dogs sodas maybe some popcorn We can also celebrate our May birthdays at that time See attached file Choir Schedule Spring doc Linda
